us_person.helper: A "U.S. person" is any citizen of the United States (including a person born in the United States who resides abroad and who has not renounced his American citizenship); any legal resident of the United States (including a US green card holder); and any permanent resident of the United States.

payment_details.title: Your payment details
payment_details.description: Please provide instructions on what should be done with the funds received through Nilos

funds.label: What should we do with the funds you receive on Nilos?
funds.helper:
If you want your funds to be converted into FIAT and transferred to the bank account you will register, please select the first option and fill the next 3 fields. Your company must be the owner of the bank account.

If you want your crypto funds to be sent to an external wallet, please select the second option and send an email to compliance@nilos.io with the beneficiary wallet address information. You don't need to fill the next 3 fields if you picked this option.

options.Any crypto received with Nilos has to be: Any crypto received with Nilos has to be automatically exchanged into FIAT and transferred to the bank account below
Any crypto received with Nilos has to be automatically transferred to an external wallet I will communicate to Nilos
